library(tidyverse)

# Remove Batch Effect
## Full proteome
### Peptide level
```{r}
data <- read_tsv(file = '~/multiomics/results/rollup/fullproteome/cycloess_normalized_sorted.tsv')
design <- read_tsv(file = '~/multiomics/results/design_files/design_Full_noPool.tsv')

dataReduced <- data %>% 
  dplyr::select(design$sample_id)

dataBatchRemoved <- removeBatchEffect(x = dataReduced,batch = design$group,batch2 = design$batch,design = design,group = design$Group.Info)
newData <- data %>% 
  select(1:6) %>% 
  bind_cols(.,dataBatchRemoved)

if(!dir.exists(paths = '~/multiomics/results/batchcorrection/fullproteome/')) {
  dir.create(path = '~/multiomics/results/batchcorrection/fullproteome/',recursive = TRUE)
}
write_tsv(x = newData,file = '~/multiomics/results/batchcorrection/fullproteome/cycloess_peptide_batchcorrected.tsv')
```
